attributes.comment:
I am concerned about the increase in these fees. Specifically, I am concerned
about the increase in fees for forms I-600 and I-600A. In October we received
approval from UCIS to adopt a child from China. We quickly submitted our
application materials to China. However, the timeline between when we will
receive a referral and be able to travel to China will likely extend further
than the 18 month approval window for us. At this point in time, there is
nothing that we can do to speed up the situation. This will force us to file
additional paperwork as well as pay the additional fees for filing of the form
and being re-fingerprinted.

I can understand the rationale to increase fees....especially if it also
delivers better service in a timely fashion. However, for some, I would ask that
perhaps if the fee were to be increased that the length of validity of the form
was also increased. This will save time and money not only for the customer
but for the agency as well.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By N. McMillan
